00020 #ifdef VP_OGL
00021 #include <GL/glu.h>
00022 #endif
00023 #include "vpsphere.h"
00024 
00025 VPSphere::VPSphere() : VPGraphicObj() {
00026     radius = 1.0;
00027 }
00028 
00029 VPSphere::VPSphere( float fRad ) : VPGraphicObj() {
00030     radius = fRad;
00031 }
00032 
00033 void VPSphere::SetRadius( float r ) {
00034     radius = r;
00035 }
00036 
00037 float VPSphere::GetRadius( void ) {
00038     return radius;
00039 }
00040 
00041 void VPSphere::ComputeBoundingBox() {
00042     bBox.SetSmallerX(-radius);
00043     bBox.SetSmallerY(-radius);
00044     bBox.SetSmallerZ(-radius);
00045     bBox.SetGreaterX(radius);
00046     bBox.SetGreaterY(radius);
00047     bBox.SetGreaterZ(radius);
00048 }
00049 
00050 bool VPSphere::DrawInstanceOGL() const {
00051 #ifdef VP_OGL
00052     GLUquadricObj* qObj = gluNewQuadric();
00053     bool result = material.DrawOGL();
00054 
00055     gluQuadricDrawStyle(qObj, GLU_FILL);
00056     gluQuadricNormals(qObj, GLU_SMOOTH);
00057     gluSphere(qObj, radius, 15, 15);
00058     gluDeleteQuadric(qObj);
00059     return result;
00060 #else
00061     return false;
00062 #endif
00063 }
